thread.title: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC
thread.title_full: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC

author: TV Guide
title: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC
text: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC Vincent D'Onofrio is going from Hell's Kitchen to being the top boss in Oz.The ... Comment Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 1:58 AM Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 1:58 AM Vincent D'Onofrio is going from Hell's Kitchen to being the top boss in Oz. The Marvel's Daredevil actor has been cast as the Wizard of Oz in Emerald City , NBC's 10-episode imagining of L. Frank Baum's beloved 14-book series, TVLine reports. D'Onofrio's version of the Wizard is no balloon-loving gent, though. He rules Oz through "inspiration, fear and a tenuous accord with the grand witches." Emerald City offers a dark spin on the classic tale, following what happens when 20-year-old Dorothy Gale lands in Oz, where the all-powerful Wizard has outlawed magic, deadly warriors prowl, and wicked witches are free to plot their mischief. NBC un-cancels its Wizard of Oz event series Emerald City NBC revived Emerald City in April after killing the project in April 2014. True Detective Season 2 star Adria Arjona joined the show as Dorothy. Are you interested in seeing Emerald City ? What twists on The Wizard of Oz would you like to see? Other Links From TVGuide.com
